help:
Hey there! The commands are:
`##help: return this`
`##play: play with youtube url plays music`
`##leave: disconnects bot from voice channel`
`##pause: pause music`
`##resume: resumes music`
`##cat: return a cat pic`
`##bear: return a running bear`
`##hi: sends a greeting`
`##bye: bids farewell`
`##sad-noises: play sad music`
